channel.title: Comments for AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Comment on Counterforce Brace with Adjustable Pads by dishliquid
item.dc:creator: dishliquid
item.description: I'm a graphic and web designer who does work for AT Surgical. I have carpal tunnel syndrome from regularly using a mouse. My wrist has been flaring up more recently, but as soon as I put this brace it stopped hurting. I was surprised the wrist brace I was using wasn't super helpful, but this targets the whole nerve bundle and reduces discomfort.
item.content:encoded: I’m a graphic and web designer who does work for AT Surgical. I have carpal tunnel syndrome from regularly using a mouse. My wrist has been flaring up more recently, but as soon as I put this brace it stopped hurting. I was surprised the wrist brace I was using wasn’t super helpful, but this targets the whole nerve bundle and reduces discomfort.

item.title: Comment on Terry Bibs by Amazon Reviews
item.dc:creator: Amazon Reviews
item.description: The bibs do the job. My son is severely disabled and drools profusely. We position the bib so the Crumb Catcher collects the secretions and we can suction out the pocket. It’s a little to big but we manage. It’s a big help.
item.content:encoded: The bibs do the job. My son is severely disabled and drools profusely. We position the bib so the Crumb Catcher collects the secretions and we can suction out the pocket. It’s a little to big but we manage. It’s a big help.

item.title: Comment on 5″ Protective Wrist Brace by jason
item.dc:creator: jason

item.title: Comment on Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve by jason
item.dc:creator: jason
item.description: Fabric is soft and the elastic stretches without applying too much pressure.
item.content:encoded: Fabric is soft and the elastic stretches without applying too much pressure.

item.title: Comment on :Multi-use Wedge/Positioning Pillow,Keeping You Comfortable While Reading, Working On Laptop, Or Watching Tv by jason
item.dc:creator: jason
item.description: We make these so I'm biased, but we make great products that are resilient and affordable.
item.content:encoded: We make these so I’m biased, but we make great products that are resilient and affordable.
